body: Hi Meeee[?]. Honeybee_Read Annual Result I is a component. To calculate DA, CDA, etc you need to run an annual analysis. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Annual_Daylight_Simulation_Example) is an example that shows the process. [](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mostaphaRoudsari/hydra_1/master/Honeybee_Annual_Daylight_Simulation_Example/Honeybee_Annual_Daylight_Simulation_Example_GH.png)
